body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Bryan Russell and the customer's name is Jennifer Murphy.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Bryan Russell, and I’m with Phat Hogs, your friendly motorcycle dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Jennifer! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I’m feeling a bit overwhelmed trying to choose the right bike.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, finding the perfect bike can be challenging! Can I ask how long you’ve been riding motorcycles?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I've been riding for about three years now.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That’s great to hear! And what type of motorcycle are you interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm looking for something sporty but comfortable.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I think we have just the right options for you! Before we continue, could I have your email address to send you some information?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's jennifer dot murphy at example dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Jennifer! Lastly, could you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's three zero three six five four one two three.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect! I will make sure to send you all the details. Thank you for your time, Jennifer!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Bryan. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! Have a great day!
